config.jeiintegration.title: JEI Integration Configuration
config.jeiintegration.handlers.comment: Enable or disable some of the recipe handlers this mod adds.
config.jeiintegration.miscellaneous.comm: It's Miscellaneous... How do you expect me to know what's in here?
config.jeiintegration.tooltips.burnTimeT: Configure the state of the burn time tooltip.
config.jeiintegration.tooltips.durabilit: Enables or disables showing you items' durability.
config.jeiintegration.tooltips.fluidRegI: Configure the state of the fluid registry information tooltip.
config.jeiintegration.tooltips.registryN: Configure the state of the registry name tooltip.
config.jeiintegration.tooltips.maxStackS: Configure the state of the max stack size tooltip.
config.jeiintegration.tooltips.metadataT: Configure the state of the metadata tooltip
config.jeiintegration.tooltips.oreDictEn: Configure the state of the ore dictionary entries tooltip.
config.jeiintegration.tooltips.unlocaliz: Configure the state of the unlocalized name tooltip.
config.jeiintegration.tooltips.internalN: Configure the state of the internal name tooltip.
